Privacy Policy

This website is hosted via GitHub Pages. When a GitHub Pages site is visited, the visitor’s IP address is logged and stored for security purposes, regardless of whether the visitor has signed into GitHub or not. For more information about GitHub’s security practices, see GitHub Privacy Statement.

I myself do not collect any data from your visit on this site.
